# Summary

This file explains the variables present in the "tide means - accel set.txt" file.

NOTE: This file borrows text directly form the source documents for the original data set, specifically "features_info.txt"

The original data set can be found here: 

https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip

## Variables

Var Keyword      | Description
-----------------|-------------------
subject          | Unique identifier for test subject
activity         | Physical activity performed while recording data
signal           | Signal form, time or frequency
signal_type      | Signal origin, body or gravity
jerk             | Flag if measurement of jerky movement
calc             | Calculation type performed
statistic        | Summary stastic calculated, mean or std. deviation
axis             | Axis of movement, X Y or Z
